title: Thai Red Curry Chicken
ingredients: ['2 tbsp olive oil or vegetable oil', '1 cloves of garlic (choppped finely)', '1 onion (chopped finely)', '2 tbsp Thai curry paste (Preferably Mae Ploy brand)', '3 chicken breasts (cut into cubes)', '1 tin of coconut milk', '450ml of chicken stock', '1 red pepper (cut into 1 inch strips)', '2 tbsp olive oil/ vegetable oil', 'a pinch of salt', 'a pinch of sugar']
